scripts.start-sandbox: docker run --rm --name my-sandbox -e flextesa_node_cors_origin='*' -e block_time=1 --detach -p 8732:20000 oxheadalpha/flextesa:20220510 jakartabox --add-bootstrap-account tz1VSUr8wwNhLAzempoch5d6hLRiTh8Cjcjb@2_000_000_000_000 --add-bootstrap-account tz1aSkwEot3L2kmUvcoxzjMomb9mvBNuzFK6@2_000_000_000_000 start
scripts.compile: yarn pre-compile && ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json
scripts.full-compile: yarn clean && yarn compile && yarn compile-lambdas
scripts.migrate-ithacanet: yarn compile && ts-node scripts/cli.ts migrate -n ithacanet
scripts.migrate-mainnet: yarn compile && ts-node scripts/cli.ts migrate -n mainnet
scripts.test-compile: ts-node scripts/cli.ts compile -f json -p contracts/test -o test/contracts -c flash_swap_agent
